sense.gloss: character (of a person), personality, disposition, nature
characteristics, nature (of a thing, event, etc.)
individuality, personality, quirk, idiosyncrasy, character, individual characteristic
special characteristic, special quality, trait, idiosyncrasy, peculiarity
resistance (e.g. to antibiotics), tolerance (e.g. drug tolerance)
very much, intensely, overwhelmingly, excessively, irresistibly, without any obvious reason

x: 相対論・そうたいろん・1

sense.gloss: physical properties, properties of matter, physicality
that which does not change according to external influences
independence of will or action, self-direction, autonomy, initiative, identity
difference between the sexes, sexual difference

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はいつも↑不思議↑↓ふしぎ↓な↑性格↑↓せいかく↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓が↑好↑↓す↓きだった。

sdata.j: でも↑可能↑↓かのう↓↑性↑↓せい↓は↑低↑↓ひく↓そうだね。
sdata.e: But the possibility seems unlikely.

sdata.j: ↑女性↑↓じょせい↓がいなければ↑世界↑↓せかい↓はどうなっていただろう。

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑寛大↑↓かんだい↓な↑性格↑↓せいかく↓に↑付↑↓つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓まない↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
